title: EliteMobs怪物不吃伤害强化
author: Strange_name

replies.author: qsefthuopq
replies.txt_content:
不兼容其他RPG插件 
插件自带的精英前缀附魔才有用，比如 精英 力量
作者原话：
Do you support [insert RPG item/powers plugin here]? 
No. There aren't any incompatibility issues to the best of my knowledge, but there is also no way to integrate items from RPG item plugins into EliteMobs nor to make powers from RPG plugins work better with EliteMobs. This is because EliteMobs has a custom combat system, since Minecraft's combat system has too many limitations set in place to properly make a boss mob plugin out of it.

replies.author: Strange_name
replies.txt_content:

作者原话：
淬炼不是rpg，是纯粹的加强
可是不过为什么原版力量buff也没用
